formattedAddress: 435 Fort Washington Ave, New York, NY 10033, USA
adrFormatAddress: 435 Fort Washington Ave, New York, NY 10033, USA

originalText.text:
If I could give this place 0 stars I would, the experience that I had at the Amber Spa at 232 Sherman Avenue was a complete disaster. First of all, the staff at the reception desk are so unwelcoming and have no manners. When you ask them for a paper or referral they do not only roll their eyes but even make you faces! And several times I have asked for a referral and they have given me random papers.

I don't know if Dr. Patria Gonzalez has been checking her staff but she definitely should.

When you call to make an appointment they leave you on hold for min of 30 mins since they have no idea what they are doing. On top of that, when I went in person, they had the audacity of denying me the service and treating me disrespectfully.

It's a complete circus.

I had 13 years as a patient at this office and I am officially leaving; Patria has lost 2 clients, as there are better quality doctors that offer a better service.

originalText.text: I went for lymphatic massages after a lipo and tummy tuck. They are VERY good. Dr G is very good and committed to her patients.The ambience is great the energy and professionalism as well. The veloshape, tempsure for high frequency,bacuum machine are offical as well as the other high effiency technology she uses. They are not Amazon made in china machines they are the official top of the line machinery. Is it not the same to go to a regular spa then it is to go to a medical spa. I HIGHLY recommend her.

originalText.text: Made an appointment which is a new feature because it was walk in waited for 50 minutes and the ladies in the front where not nice or helpful forced us to wait outside in heat but allowed all the other patients inside…. They did not want to help and they lost 3 costumers today because I took my friends to get an appointment as well.

originalText.text: Dr. Patria Gonzalez and her team are amazing. I encourage anyone to visit her office and transform your body into a healing and healthy one.  Dr. Gonzalez Thank you for making us feel at home in a stress free evironment.

originalText.text: Been going here for years. Dr. G. and staff are always professional, friendly and caring. They are all truly amazing.
